import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import FitGrid from "../../Images/FitGrid.png"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useCookies } from "react-cookie"; const Navbar = () => { const [isMenuOpened, setIsMenuOpened] = useState(false); const [user, setUser] = useState(false); const [cookie, setCookie, removeCookie] = useCookies(["token"]); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); // إضافة هذا السطر useEffect(() => { if (cookie.token !== undefined) { setUser(true); } else { setUser(false); } }, [cookie]); const location = useLocation(); if (location.pathname === "/login" || location.pathname === "/signup") { return null; } return (
